name: Forbidden Library (Lemon_Toast)
description:
We are part of the Games Academy GmbH, Berlin. As students we have around 5-6 weeks to develop a game. Although it's our first semester we tried our best to develop a short, but fun game.


Team members

VFX - Filip Enache
Art - Darlene Schulz
Art - Niklas Damovsky
Art, Game Design - Nils Rüger
Art, Game Design - Nico Leopold


Contributors/External team members

Programming - Felix Lenz
Programming - Sebastian Gsänger
Programming - James Ferreira
Production - Daniel Zummach
Soundtrack Composer - Lukas Piel
